sentences.en: A problem has been encountered while creating the unattend file. Canceling Setup.
sentences.cn: 创建无人参与文件时遇到问题, 正在取消安装程序.

sentences.en: But the setup he is using shows his assumption incorrect.
sentences.cn: 但他使用的方法说明他的假设是不正确的.

sentences.en: But you don't know the medical setup. Whatever power you have doesn't mean anything to them.
sentences.cn: 但是你不了解医学界的那一套,随便你有多大的权力,对他们也丝毫不起作用.

sentences.en: Follow the onscreen prompts provided by the SETUP program.
sentences.cn: 按照SETUP程序提供的屏幕提示操作.

sentences.en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

sentences.en: It require change to the setup menu as show below.
sentences.cn: 它需对安装菜单做修改,如下所示.

sentences.en: Please make a setup disk and boot from it to install.
sentences.cn: 请制作一张启动盘用启动盘启动安装.

sentences.en: Press the setup button to display the setup menu, and move the highlight down to audio.
sentences.cn: 按Setup键显示Setup菜单, 然后移动亮条到Audio选项上.

sentences.en: Recopy the component from the distribution disks, using the SETUP program.
sentences.cn: 使用SETUP程序从分发磁盘上重新复制该组件.

sentences.en: Setup will save your system files in a hide, compressed file.
sentences.cn: Setup会把你的系统文件保存在一隐藏的压缩文件中.

sentences.en: Somehow they found a less stressful setup than reactor meltdown.
sentences.cn: 他们会无缘无故的搞些没像反应堆灾难那么紧迫的操作.

sentences.en: The border files cannot be accessed. Please re - run Setup and try again.
sentences.cn: 无法访问边框文件.请重新运行安装程序,然后再试.

sentences.en: The new setup of the world has not formed.
sentences.cn: 新的世界格局尚未形成.

sentences.en: The worst part of the setup is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.cn: 安装过程中最糟糕的部分就是差劲的操作手册。

sentences.en: These food markets have more or less the same setup.
sentences.cn: 几个菜市场的格局差不多.

sentences.en: We brought up a mechanical setup to apply external tensile strain.
sentences.cn: 我们建构了一种机制来施加外在的伸展应力.

words.tran_cn: 设置；机构；组织；调整；计划；装备

phrases.tran_cn: 准备时间；建立时间；设置时间

trans.tran_cn: 计划，<口>组织，姿势，<口>故意安排使一方易胜的比赛，体制
trans.tran_en: The setup of computer hardware or software is the process of installing it and making it ready to use
